{-# LANGUAGE OverloadedStrings , DeriveGeneric, GeneralizedNewtypeDeriving, DeriveDataTypeable #-}
module Alarm.DB.Keys.Types where

import Data.Aeson
import GHC.Generics (Generic)
import Data.Text
import Data.Text.Encoding
import Data.Serialize
import Data.ByteString
import Control.Applicative  ((<$>),(<*>))
import Data.Typeable
import qualified Data.Map as M
import qualified Data.ByteString.Lazy as LBS

-------------------------------------------------- 
newtype AlarmKey = AlarmKey {
      almKey :: Text
      }
  deriving(Show,Ord,Eq,Generic,Typeable)
          
instance FromJSON AlarmKey where          
instance ToJSON AlarmKey where

--------------------------------------------------  
data AlarmKeyConf =  AlarmKeyConf {
      src  :: AlarmKeySrc
      }                 
  deriving (Read,Show,Eq,Typeable)


instance FromJSON AlarmKeyConf where
    parseJSON (Object tObj) = AlarmKeyConf <$>
                          tObj .: "src"

    parseJSON _ = fail "Rule: Expecting AlarmKey Config Object Received, Other"

instance ToJSON AlarmKeyConf where 
   toJSON (AlarmKeyConf a) = object ["src" .= toJSON a]

--------------------------------------------------  
-- | KeyRouteConf contains the mapping to route the keys to different host
data KeyRouteConf =  KeyRouteConf {
        krKey  :: String
      , krDes  :: String
      }                 
  deriving (Read,Show,Eq)

instance FromJSON KeyRouteConf where
    parseJSON (Object tObj) = KeyRouteConf <$>
                          tObj .: "key" <*>
                          tObj .: "des" 

    parseJSON _ = fail "Rule: Expecting KeySourceConf Object Received, Other"

instance ToJSON KeyRouteConf where 
   toJSON (KeyRouteConf a b) = object [ "key" .= toJSON a, "des" .= toJSON b]
--------------------------------------------------
-- | KeyRoute Map contains the keyRouteConf List and the SingleKeyRoute Map
data KeyRouteMap = KeyRouteMap {
      krconfList :: [KeyRouteConf],
      srkmap :: M.Map LBS.ByteString String
    } deriving (Generic)

--------------------------------------------------
-- | Using SText in order to serialize Text  
newtype SText = SText {  
    unSText :: Text
    }
  deriving(Read,Show,Eq,Ord,Generic,Typeable)

instance ToJSON SText where   
instance FromJSON SText where

instance Serialize SText where 
  put txt = put $ encodeUtf8.unSText $ txt 
  get = SText . decodeUtf8 <$> (get)

--------------------------------------------------  
newtype AlarmKeySrc = AlarmKeySrc {
      almKeySrc :: SText
      }
  deriving(Read,Show,Eq,Ord,Generic,Typeable)
           
instance FromJSON AlarmKeySrc where
instance ToJSON AlarmKeySrc where
instance Serialize AlarmKeySrc where

-------------------------------------------------- 
newtype AlarmKeyDest = AlarmKeyDest {
      almKeyDest :: SText
      }
  deriving(Read,Show,Eq,Ord,Generic,Typeable)

instance FromJSON AlarmKeyDest where  
instance ToJSON AlarmKeyDest where
instance Serialize AlarmKeyDest where

-------------------------------------------------- 
newtype AlarmKeyAId = AlarmKeyAId {
      almKeyAId :: ByteString
      }
  deriving(Show,Eq,Ord,Generic,Typeable)

instance Serialize AlarmKeyAId where
-------------------------------------------------- 
newtype AlarmKeyTime = AlarmKeyTime {
      almKeyTime :: Int
      }
  deriving(Show,Eq,Ord,Generic,Typeable)


instance FromJSON AlarmKeyTime where  
instance ToJSON AlarmKeyTime where
instance Serialize AlarmKeyTime where
--------------------------------------------------
